references.paper_title: Large scale gan training for high fidelity natural image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational for GAN-based image synthesis and its impact is visible in many subsequent works, making it highly influential for the field.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced a highly influential approach for using transformers in image generation, directly impacting token-based image synthesis.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This work demonstrated the superiority of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, substantially changing the direction of the field and becoming a benchmark for future works.
This paper introduced MaskGIT, the first non-autoregressive transformer for image generation, serving as the direct precursor to the EfficientNAT model in the subject paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced the resolution and quality achievable via diffusion models, pushing the boundaries of image synthesis and influencing the field.
